FuncDef: This command configures the Error Window value used by thefail-on-errorfeature.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the time, in minutes, that the MDA can experience frequent Ingress XPL Errors. When fail-on-error is enabled, if more than xpl-errors Ingress XPL errors per minute occur on the MDA for the specified number of consecutive minutes, the MDA will be put in the failed state. Values-1 to 1440.
